RAZER.name: Razer Blade 15 Base Model Core i7 10th Gen
RAZER.description: Razer has finally brought a laptop that is truly is made for gamers. From the design to the intricate choice of components has made this laptop be the number one choice for any gamer. From sleek design a to the battery life this is the best portable gaming laptop in its generation.

specification.processor: Intel Core i7-10750H Processor (12M Cache, 2.60 GHz up to 5.00 GHz)
specification.display: 15.6' Full HD 144Hz up to 100% sRGB 4.9 mm bezel Display

RAZER.name: Razer Book 13
RAZER.description: The new Razer Book 13 Laptop is a powerful slim laptop that weighs in at just 1.4Kg. This Razer Beast is powered by Intel Core i7-1165G7 Quad-Core Processor (12MB Cache, 2.80GHz up to 4.70GHz) and has 13.4' Full HD Matte 60Hz Slim side bezel Touch display with Up to 178° wide viewing angles.

specification.processor: Intel Core i7-1165G7 Quad-Core Processor (12MB Cache, 2.80GHz up to 4.70GHz)

RAZER.name: Razer Blade 15 Advanced Model
RAZER.description: Razer Blade 15 Advanced Model Laptop powered by 11th Gen Intel Core i7-11800H 8 Cores (2.3GHz / 4.6GHz) with NVIDIA GeForce Graphics. This Razer Gaming Laptop featured with up to NVIDIA GeForce RTX3060 (6GB DDR6 VRAM) , and up to15.6' QHD 240Hz, 100% DCI-P3, G-Sync, 2.5ms, individually factory calibrated for an obscene competitive advantage in high-FPS games.

specification.processor: Intel Core i7-11800H Processor (24M Cache, 2.30 GHz up to 4.60 GHz)
specification.Battery: Built-in 65 Whr rechargeable lithium-ion polymer battery

specification.processor: Intel Core i7-10875H Processor (16M Cache, 2.30 GHz up to 5.10 GHz)
